content.html:
FLICKERLESS S.S. SETTING


Select ON to allow shutter speed to be fine-tuned to reduce flick-
er caused by LED lighting and the like.


Options


ON OFF

MODE
IS Reduce blur caused by camera shake or subject motion.
OptionDescription
CONTINUOUS + MOTIONImage stabilization on. If + MOTION is selected, the camera will adjust shutter speed to reduce motion blur when mov- ing objects are detected.
(⌀) , CONTINUOUS
》201) SHOOTING + MOTIONAs above, except that image stabilization is performed only when the shutter button is pressed halfway (focus mode AF-C only) or the shutter is released. If + MOTION is selected, the camera will adjust shutter speed to reduce motion blur when moving objects are detected.
))2 SHOOTING ONLY
OFFImage stabilization off. Choose this option when using a tripod.
+ MOTION has no effect when sensitivity is set to a fixed value, and may also be unavailable at some other combinations of settings. The effect may vary with lighting conditions and the speed at which the object is moving. ● The setting selected with the lens image stabilization switch, if any, takes priority over the setting chosen with IS MODE. ● Note that vibration or camera sounds may be noticeable as image stabilization takes effect.
This option takes effect only in modes S and M.

The
Shooting
Menus
176
content.markdown:
# FLICKERLESS S.S. SETTING

Select ON to allow shutter speed to be fine-tuned to reduce flick-
er caused by LED lighting and the like.

# Options

ON OFF

This option takes effect only in modes S and M.

| MODE | MODE |
| --- | --- |
| IS Reduce blur caused by camera shake or subject motion. | IS Reduce blur caused by camera shake or subject motion. |
| Option | Description |
| CONTINUOUS + MOTION | Image stabilization on. If + MOTION is selected, the camera will adjust shutter speed to reduce motion blur when mov- ing objects are detected. |
| (⌀) , CONTINUOUS | Image stabilization on. If + MOTION is selected, the camera will adjust shutter speed to reduce motion blur when mov- ing objects are detected. |
| 》201) SHOOTING + MOTION | As above, except that image stabilization is performed only when the shutter button is pressed halfway (focus mode AF-C only) or the shutter is released. If + MOTION is selected, the camera will adjust shutter speed to reduce motion blur when moving objects are detected. |
| ))2 SHOOTING ONLY | As above, except that image stabilization is performed only when the shutter button is pressed halfway (focus mode AF-C only) or the shutter is released. If + MOTION is selected, the camera will adjust shutter speed to reduce motion blur when moving objects are detected. |
| OFF | Image stabilization off. Choose this option when using a tripod. |
| + MOTION has no effect when sensitivity is set to a fixed value, and may also be unavailable at some other combinations of settings. The effect may vary with lighting conditions and the speed at which the object is moving. ● The setting selected with the lens image stabilization switch, if any, takes priority over the setting chosen with IS MODE. ● Note that vibration or camera sounds may be noticeable as image stabilization takes effect. | + MOTION has no effect when sensitivity is set to a fixed value, and may also be unavailable at some other combinations of settings. The effect may vary with lighting conditions and the speed at which the object is moving. ● The setting selected with the lens image stabilization switch, if any, takes priority over the setting chosen with IS MODE. ● Note that vibration or camera sounds may be noticeable as image stabilization takes effect. |

Menus

Select ON to allow shutter speed to be fine-tuned to reduce flick-
er caused by LED lighting and the like.
